name: scrolling-gestures
description: Navigate your browser history with horizontal scrolling on your trackpad or mouse wheel, while still being able to scroll left and right.
author: nandhp

preferences.title: Gesture Speed
preferences.description: Maximum interval between wheel steps in milliseconds. (Higher number allows slower gestures)
preferences.name: gestureTimeout

preferences.title: Gesture Length
preferences.description: Length of the gesture in wheel steps.
preferences.name: gestureLength

preferences.title: Wheel Inertia Timeout
preferences.description: After detecting a gesture, do not repeat the action until this much time (in milliseconds) has passed since the last wheel step.
preferences.name: gestureUnlockTimeout
